name: Poisonous Snake
description: The Poisonous Snake is a small, agile beast with a venomous bite. It is primarily designed to ambush unsuspecting adventurers with its agility and poison capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to inflict poison damage, which can incapacitate or weaken characters, makes it a sneaky threat despite its small size.
goals: Usually serves as a trap in low-level encounters or ambushing unsuspecting prey.
relations: It might be encountered with other small creatures or in environments with similar low-level beasts.
environment: Commonly found in areas where it can hide and ambush prey.
strengths: Relies on agility and venom to pose a threat despite its size.
weaknesses: Very low Strength and Constitution, making it fragile in combat.
attacks: Uses a melee bite attack that deals piercing damage and can inflict additional poison damage on a failed saving throw.
most_powerful_ability: The Reflexive Nip reaction can poison attackers trying to hit it in close combat.
senses: Possesses keen senses that allow it to detect threats within 10 feet.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth, making it adept at hiding.
additional_information: Can inflict additional 2 poison damage on a failed Constitution save.
Uses agility to evade attacks moderately well.
Serves as a trap in low-level encounters.
